name: Wheel of Fortune Deluxe
description:
"Wheel... Of... Fortune!"

That's the introduction to America's favorite game show. Now you have a chance to spin the Wheel as a contestant! This updated version of Wheel of Fortune has all-new graphics and puzzles, to challenge and entertain you. Pick a consonant or buy a vowel to solve puzzles in three exciting new game modes: Road Trip, Group Play and Puzzle of the Day. Create your own profile and earn trophies or virtual cash -- but look out for the dreaded Bankrupt and Lose a Turn wedges. Spin to win in the sparkling new version of this beloved game.

  • 2,000 puzzles created by the show's staff
  • Play alone, versus the PC, or versus others at the same keyboard
  • Earn in-game trophies and badges for high scores

All rights go to Sony
